title: Grounds Crew Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at National Sports Center in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: Had one interview with the two main bosses at the time, both were pretty chill and the interview was pretty casual. I came in dressed somewhat causal as well. They were pretty keen to give me the job.
Interview Questions:
Tell us about yourself and your background?

Are you willing to work long hours?

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at National Sports Center
Interview Descriptions: I applied, got a call for the interview and then scheduled it that same week. Met with supervisor and answered a few questions related to the job. Was hired on the spot, and started the next week.
Interview Questions: Tell me why we should hire you
